Make Way For Bollywood Royalty! Ranveer Singh And Deepika Padukone Look Ethereal At Their Mumbai Reception
Make Way For Bollywood Royalty! Ranveer Singh And Deepika Padukone Look Ethereal At Their Mumbai Reception
Ranveer Singh and Deepika Padukone are just raising the bar for the all the couples and teaching them how celebrations should be done.
For their last wedding party thrown by Ranveer's sister Ritika, the couple was seen burning the dance floor with their epic dance moves. And now, they are ready for another round of celebrations in their own city, Mumbai.
Viral Bhayani
According to reports, the couple for the very first time has invited the Indian media for their first Mumbai reception. The couple has chosen to invite their close family and friends. The couple will host another Mumbai reception for their fraternity friends on 1st December.
